about.summary: An interface to the 'NetCDF' file formats designed by Unidata for efficient storage of array-oriented scientific data and descriptions. Most capabilities of 'NetCDF' version 4 are supported. Optional conversions of time units are enabled by 'UDUNITS' version 2, also from Unidata.

An interface to the 'NetCDF' file formats designed by Unidata for efficient storage of array-oriented scientific data and descriptions. Most capabilities of 'NetCDF' version 4 are supported. Optional conversions of time units are enabled by 'UDUNITS' version 2, also from Unidata.

name: r-rnetcdf

about.summary: An interface to the 'NetCDF' file formats designed by Unidata for efficient storage of array-oriented scientific data and descriptions. Most capabilities of 'NetCDF' version 4 are supported. Optional conversions of time units are enabled by 'UDUNITS' version 2, also from Unidata.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.9-2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rnetcdf
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/RNetCDF_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/RNetCDF/RNetCDF_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 15759c2ddfb0943c89bf3c9f7349ca29c499707201cc317d238ca7a854d4b331

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}          # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}    # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}grep              # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake          # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}pkg-config
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - libnetcdf
    - udunits2
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('RNetCDF')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('RNetCDF')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.unidata.ucar.edu/software/netcdf/
  dev_url: https://github.com/mjwoods/RNetCDF
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3
    - LICENSE
  summary: An interface to the 'NetCDF' file formats designed by Unidata for efficient storage of array-oriented scientific data and descriptions. Most capabilities of 'NetCDF' version 4 are supported. Optional conversions of time units are enabled by 'UDUNITS' version 2, also from Unidata.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
    - marcelotrevisani
    - conda-forge/r
